review: Whatever you say, this is a perfect companion for my TV

review: I'v used this to stream music from, my phone to the tv. It's been simple for guests to also easily connect their phones and stream their videos and music for others to enjoy. Very convenient to have during get togethers.

review: Works fine, However not too many feature and you should make sure you have a good internet connection.In General it serves me well and very easy to install...
